attributes.action: Public Hanging of convicted Pedofiles, Child abducters and Rapists
attributes.additional_details: Pedofiles, rapists, sex dungeons and child abduction and child abuse, children being snatched and killed or used for peoples weird sexual desires. Now is the time for public hanging to make a come back we are on a mission to have these perverts to be publicly hanged as they cost this country thousands if not millions of Great British Pounds each year to be housed at her majestys pleasure, i say enough is enough hang them and make this great british land of ours a safer place for our children.
